pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, February 21, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Dartmouth, Nova Scotia

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will make a roadway infrastructure improvement announcement, and hold a media availability. Minister of Rural Economic Development Bernadette Jordan will be in attendance.

Armour Transportation Systems
80 Guildford Avenue

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media should arrive by the administration office (Entrance B) no later than 9:30 a.m.
    • Media requiring parking for satellite trucks should contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca

Cherry Brook, Nova Scotia

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will tour the Black Cultural Centre for Nova Scotia historical exhibits.

Black Cultural Centre for Nova Scotia
10 Cherry Brook Road

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 12:30 p.m.

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister and Member of Parliament Andy Fillmore will meet with youth from Halifax.

Closed to media.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a Black History Month celebration hosted by the Black Cultural Centre for Nova Scotia, and deliver brief remarks.

Black Cultural Centre for Nova Scotia
10 Cherry Brook Road

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 12:30 p.m.
